resources.string: An array in the Java programming language has the ability to store many different types of values
The == operator can be used to compare two String objects. The result is always true if the two strings are identical
An individual array element from an array of type int, when passed to a method is passed by value
A class in java should start with a capital letter
In Android Studio the MainActivity class is the boss that takes care of launching the app
Activities in android apps dictate the UI and handle the user interaction to the smart phone screen
Services in android apps handle background processing associated with an application
Content provides handle data and database management issues

An event listener is in the View class that contains a single callback method. These methods will be called by the Android framework when the View to which the listener has been registered is triggered by the user
An Android Intent is an abstract description of an operation to be performed. It can be used with startActivity to launch an Activity
In java you can create any variable by just naming it, example number =5
The activity_main.xml is under the values directory in the resources folder
You are a great Android App developer
